DKGH.summary: DKG Capital, Inc. provides tokenization and other software solutions in the Asia Pacific region. The company was formerly known as Star Ally, Inc. DKG Capital, Inc. was founded in 2013 and is headquartered in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia.

WECT.summary: Weconnect Tech International, Inc. operates as an IT-solutions provider in Malaysia. Weconnect Tech International, Inc. was founded in 2015 and is based in Petaling Jaya, Malaysia.
